pageContext.claim: “A very important, and respected, in some circles, Democrat, said we want to get rid — we should get rid of our Second Amendment. In other words, get rid of it.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is referring to retired Justice John Paul Stevens, who wrote an opinion piece in the New York Times calling for the repeal of the Second Amendment. Stevens for years was the leader of the Supreme Court’s liberal wing; his ideology was clearly in sync with the Democratic Party. But he has never publicly identified as a Democrat and was a Republican appointment to the Supreme Court.
